entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 07:00 AM EDT Monday 02 May 2016
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 4.3°C
Wind: NE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 02 May 2016
